attributes.action: Stop organisations providing an option for people to disclose vaccine status
attributes.additional_details: Medical records are private and allowing organisations to display vaccine status of individuals gives a false sense of security as there is you can still get covid and pass it on regardless of whether you have had the vaccine or not. It manipulates people into sharing private information that can indirectly put others who want to keep that information private at a disadvantage.
attributes.background: Medical records are private, therefore organisations that allow its users or employees to display vaccine status can put those who choose to keep their medical background private at a disadvantage.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It's a decision for individuals whether to disclose personal information about themselves, including medical data.
